description:
Mio is the second attendant Makoto enters a contract with. She has a human form but is actually the Black Spider of Disaster, a beast who devours just about anything. Mio`s insatiable appetite drives her to insanity but the pain she suffers from her battle with Makoto leaves her feeling pleasured, satiated, and willing to serve as his attendant.
Source: Nippon TV
name: Mio
